meanings.definition: A class of drugs used to treat migraines.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed triptans for my severe headaches.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from migraines by taking triptans.
meanings.sent3: The triptans in my medicine cabinet are my best friends during a migraine attack.
meanings.sent4: Triptans are like warriors fighting against the pain of migraines.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of triptans in treating migraines is truly remarkable.
